LUC_values <- c("Single Family Residential Suburban", 
                "Single Family Residential Urban", 
                "Multi-Family Residential", 
                "Commerical / Industrial", 
                "Agricultural / Undeveloped (20-99 Acres)", 
                "Agricultural / Undeveloped (100+ Acres)", 
                "Other", 
                "Undefined")
LUC_values <- factor(LUC_values, levels = LUC_values)

mypalette <- colorBin(palette = "Paired", as.numeric(LUC_values))
colors18 <- mypalette(unclass(factor(Gooch2018$LUC_FIN)))
colors19 <- mypalette(unclass(factor(Gooch2019$LUC_FIN)))
colors20 <- mypalette(unclass(factor(Gooch2020$LUC_FIN)))
colors21 <- mypalette(unclass(factor(Gooch2021$LUC_FIN)))
